name: Mantle of the Twelfth Hour
passive: Last Stand: When below 35% Health, gain 30% increased damage and 20% damage reduction for 5 seconds (45 second cooldown).
description: Item that provides Ability Power, Health, Magic Resist, Armor, Movement Speed. Passive effect: When below 35% Health, gain 30% increased damage and 20% damage reduction for 5 seconds (45 second cooldown).. Perfect for frontline champions who need to absorb damage.
tips: The movement speed helps with roaming and map presence
Great for champions who need to reposition frequently in fights
Helps with both engaging and disengaging from unfavorable situations
Provides excellent sustain in lane and during fights
The healing/lifesteal helps you stay in fights longer
